metadata.title: CVE-2022-38096 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability was found in vmwgfx driver indrivers/gpu/vmxgfx/vmxgfx_execbuf.c in GPU component of Linux kernel withdevice file '/dev/dri/renderD128 (or Dxxx)'. This flaw allows a localattacker with a user account on the system to gain privilege, causing adenial of service(DoS).

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-aws package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fde package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
